item.title: Frame 114? (system update)

@Yz85Racer wrote:

else if(command.startsWith("update")) { int time = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players; i++) { client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[i]; c.frame114(time); } for(Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { p.updateRequired = true; p.person.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; p.updateRequired = true; p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } }
Try that.

else if (command.startsWith("f114")) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) { int x1 = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); frame114(x1); person.updateRequired = true; person.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }}}}

item.title: Frame 114? (system update)
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }
meh, try this:
type ::update 60 or something there you have an update message.

it might not be through f114 but it’s the same thing you want to get

item.title: Frame 114? (system update)
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

public void frame114(int i1) // system update { outStream.createFrame(114); outStream.writeWordBigEndian(i1); sendMessage("Frame 114 tested"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

test command

else if (command.startsWith("f114")) { try { int x1 = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); frame114(x1); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::f114 #"); } }

ok i know how to use the command ::f114 time
but what i really want to know is how i can change it to be world wide? (so everyone can see it not just me)
if anyone knows itd gladly appreciate it

Read full topic
